instructions: On your Android phone or tablet, open the Chrome app . At the top right, tap Switch tabs . On the right, you'll see your open Incognito tabs. At the top right of your Incognito tabs, tap Close .

In Viber, open the contact's info screen. Tap the Add Contact button, which is a plus sign in iOS and a person with a plus sign icon on Android phones. Enter an alternate name for the contact if you don't want to use the name the contact entered in the info screen. Select the Check Mark in Android or tap Save on an iPhone to add the person to your contacts list.

Open your Viber Contacts screen. Tap the Add Contact button, which is a plus sign in iOS and a person with a plus sign icon on Android phones. Enter the person's information and phone number using international format. Include the area code and international code preceded with a + sign. Viber uses a person s phone number to recognize them worldwide. Tap Continue or Done . Choose the Check Mark in Android or tap Save in iOS.

Go to the More options menu on your Android or iOS phone. Select Add Contact and enter the information there. Scan a potential contact's QR code to enter the information into your contact list. Ask your friend to open a QR code from the More options screen. Follow the on-screen instructions to scan the QR code. Open the Viber app on a Windows 10 phone and click the Add contact button. Tap the plus icon and add the contact's information there. You can also type a new number on your phone's keypad and save to your Windows contact list by tapping the plus icon.
